markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Irovetti's Fetch](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2374)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 50

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 48

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 45
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 20">[Irovetti's Fetch](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2374)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=69" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 492</row>

**Perception** +36; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); [_tongues_](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +39, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +39, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +39, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +32

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +10

**Dex** +6

**Con** +9

**Int** +2

**Wis** +8

**Cha** +6
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 44 

**Fort** +37 

**Ref** +32 

**Will** +34 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 440

, regeneration 45 (deactivated by fire or negative)

**Weaknesses**
cold iron 20, negative 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, [_air walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=6)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fetch weapon +38 ([Backswing](/Traits.aspx?ID=173), [Forceful](/Traits.aspx?ID=180)),
**Damage** 4d6+18 slashing plus 3d6 mental and 4d6 fire

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 40, attack +31
- **Cantrips (10th)**
[Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **7th**
[Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (to or from the First World only)
- **9th**
[Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77)
- **10th**
[Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116)
- **Constant (9th)**
[Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)

**Manifest Fetch Weapon** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) **Trigger** The fetch starts its turn; **Effect** A fetch weapon manifests in the fetch's hand. As soon as a fetch weapon is no longer wielded by a fetch, it vanishes. The fetch chooses the type of weapon it manifests, but it does not gain any of that weapon's standard weapon traits, instead using the traits listed above in the fetch weapon Strike.

</column>
name: Irovetti's Fetch

spell_markdown: [Air Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=6), [Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77), [Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116), [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340)
text: Irovetti's Fetch Recall Knowledge - Fey (Nature): DC 50 Unspecific Lore : DC 48 Specific Lore : DC 45 Irovetti's Fetch Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 492 Perception +36; darkvision Languages Common, Sylvan; tongues Skills Athletics +39, Deception +39, Intimidation +39, Society +32 Str +10 Dex +6 Con +9 Int +2 Wis +8 Cha +6 --- AC 44 Fort +37 Ref +32 Will +34 +1 status to all saves vs. magic HP 440 , regeneration 45 (deactivated by fire or negative) Weaknesses cold iron 20, negative 20 --- Speed 35 feet, air walk Melee Single Action fetch weapon +38 (Backswing, Forceful), Damage 4d6+18 slashing plus 3d6 mental and 4d6 fire Primal Innate Spells DC 40, attack +31 - Cantrips (10th) Produce Flame, Read Aura - 7th Plane Shift (to or from the First World only) - 9th Disjunction - 10th Finger of Death - Constant (9th) Air Walk, Tongues Manifest Fetch Weapon Free Action (Conjuration, Primal) Trigger The fetch starts its turn; Effect A fetch weapon manifests in the fetch's hand. As soon as a fetch weapon is no longer wielded by a fetch, it vanishes. The fetch chooses the type of weapon it manifests, but it does not gain any of that weapon's standard weapon traits, instead using the traits listed above in the fetch weapon Strike.
